section.title: Course search
section.para: Replaced “Course code” and “Class code” search. Functionality has now been combined in the “Code” search. Searching on “begins with” will search on the Course code. Searching with “ends with” will search on the class code. Note: As an example “ARC134B-0023” is the full course-class code where “ARC134B” is the course code, and “0023” is the class code.

section.title: Messaging
section.para: We’ve now included the ability to untick message recipients from a list of contacts.

section.title: XML exporting
section.para: Significant enhancements to the Indesign and XML export.

section.title: Reports
